page.title: 16HOMES
page.content: The area comprises{four main } {concentration of houses}..at{W. and E. {Ashling,North Bosham and at North {Fishbourne.}The latter two are both residential areas built up on the main A27 road. The majority of homes are{owner {occupied}but each area also has a {small council estate,}although the trend is for the occupiers to buy these too. Homes in the area tend to be {extremely expensive}reflecting the nearness to Chichester and the coast together with the scenic beauty. {Tourists}are frequently attracted by the{quaint cottages}and houses often with{thatched}roofs.A number of {historic dwelling}exist. The area also has a number of more isolated farm dwellings.
